examples.korean: They couldn't find what they were looking for. 발음듣기 그들은 찾아헤매던 것을 발견하지 못했죠. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 박지영(jypa****) Web Collection

examples.korean: I could hear him bumbling around in the kitchen. 발음듣기 그가 부엌에서 갈팡질팡 헤매는 소리가 들렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I could hear him bumbling around in the kitchen. 발음

examples.korean: The child was found wandering the streets alone. 발음듣기 그 아이는 길거리에서 혼자 헤매고 있다가 발견되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The child was found wandering the streets alone. 발음

examples.korean: Pete and Jo were still in the land of Nod, so I went out for a walk in the morning sunshine. 발음듣기 피트와 조는 아직도 꿈나라를 헤매고 있어서 나는 아침 햇살 속에 산책을 하러 나갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Pete and Jo were still in the land of Nod, so I went out for a walk in the morning sunshine. 발음

examples.korean: The children wandered in the woods. 발음듣기 아이들이 숲 속에서 길을 헤매었다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The children wandered in the woods. 발음
